author: justinasr
body:
#### PR description:

Use cmsweb-prod.cern.ch for "DbsUrl" attribute in the dictionary that is submitted to ReqMgr2 by MatrixInjector.

Relevant ticket on gitlab: https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-http-group/doc/-/issues/256 

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33209
Backport because 10_6_X is still used in production.
title: [Backport to 10_6_X] Change DBS url to cmsweb-prod in MatrixInjector
